At the Venue


For virtual attendance, please check here.

Map of Daegu EXCO

For the overall program please check out the overview.

For information about getting to EXCO please check out the travel information

Registration

The registration desk will be set up near Room 325. The desk will be operational during the following times:

Jul 9 3:00pm - 6:00pm
Jul 10 7:30am - 6:00pm
Jul 11 7:30am - 6:00pm
Jul 12 8:00am - 6:00pm
Jul 13 8:00am - 6:00pm
Jul 14 8:00am - 6:00pm

Paper Sessions

Paper sessions will be conducted in Room 325 as per the schedule.

Posters

Attendees are requested to ensure their posters are mounted and unmounted at the beginning and by the end of the times provided below.

Workshop Posters

Posters for workshops can be mounted during the specific workshop timings within each workshop room location. The posters should be mounted and dismounted within the workshop timings or the following times (workshop timings taking precedence):

Jul 10 8:00am - 6:00pm
Jul 14 12:00pm - 6:00pm

RSS Pioneers Posters

Posters for RSS Pioneers can be mounted inside Grand Ballroom A. The posters should be mounted and dismounted within the following times:

Jul 11 8:00am - 11:00am
Jul 12 8:00am - 11:00am
Jul 13 8:00am - 11:00am

Accepted Paper Posters

Posters for accepted papers can be mounted inside Grand Ballroom A. The posters should be mounted and dismounted within the following times:

Jul 11 12:00pm - 6:00pm
Jul 12 12:00pm - 6:00pm
Jul 13 12:00pm - 6:00pm
Jul 14 8:00am - 12:00pm


Demonstrations

Authors of RSS 2023 Demo papers will also have the opportunity to demonstrate the robotics technology highlighted by their contributions during the early afternoon coffee break (2:30pm to 3pm) on the day that their demo paper is presented.

Jul 11 2:30pm-3:00pm Paper 23 (demo 1 area) and Paper 24 (demo 2 area)
Jul 12 2:30pm-3:00pm Paper 55 (demo 1 area) and Paper 56 (demo 2 area)
Jul 13 2:30pm-3:00pm Paper 87 (demo 1 area) and Paper 88 (demo 2 area)


The layout of EXCO Grand Ballroom A shows the numbered poster stands that correspond to the Poster ID for each paper. Click on individual paper pages to find its Poster ID where it will be showcased during its poster session in the Grand Ballroom.


Accessibility

Accessibility information is available here.


Venue Facilities

EXCO has several facilities available on site.

    EXCO Location     Timings
Nursing Room     West Wing 1F     09:00am - 6:00pm
First Aid     West Wing 1F     09:00am - 6:00pm
Lockers     West Wing 1F     09:00am - 9:00pm
ATM     West Wing 1F     09:00am - 9:00pm


KNU Global Plaza (for RSS Pioneers) has the following facilities on site.

    KNU Location  
Nursing Room     Room 205 (next to workshop)

Please reach out to the local volunteers for any assistance.
